content: {"name": "North Brooklyn Angels - Mobile Soup Kitchen (Southside /Division Avenue)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The truck is parked across the street from the Williamsburgh Library on the Division Avenue Overpass, between Marcy Avenue & Rodney Street.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.northbrooklynangels.org/meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "240 Division Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Williamsburg", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11211", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7069143, "longitude": -73.9575883}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 574-0058", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Mobile soup kitchen truck"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Bulk food distribution is via: Free pop up green markets at meal sites."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
